summary: Post-completion refactoring: extracted shared rate limiting into fec-api.js, added npm scripts for candidate pipeline, fixed exit code logic in company pipeline, fixed stripTitles regex. All builds verified (iOS BUILD SUCCEEDED, all JS syntax OK).
nextSteps: All roadmap phases and refinements complete. Project is ready for production use. Potential future work: add automated tests, expand to additional states/districts beyond Wake County NC, add state-level race support (Governor, state legislature).
